description: Black running shorts with red trim

core:description.text: Sleek black running shorts designed for peak athletic performance, featuring striking red trim along the sides and hem. The lightweight synthetic fabric offers superior moisture management and quick-drying properties. Built-in liner provides comfortable support, while the elastic waistband with internal drawstring ensures a secure, customizable fit. Side splits enhance freedom of movement, and a small zippered pocket keeps essentials secure during your run.
